The promo we have is unlike any of our normal offers (usually location specific), as it allows global discounts at any of our locations, for any of our packages - only for LET users, because you're awesome.

This discount code;

1. Applies 50% discount at cart for any Flexible Resources or Fixed Instances
2. Is permanent and for the life of the service created
3. Will de-activate after 100 uses (first come, first served!)

The code is: LET2018

Link: https://manage.dediserve.com/index.php?cmd=module&module=54&cid=845

Using this, you can bag one of our 1GB Dediserve Fixed instances for the LET-only price of €5/mo, more importantly **it can be applied to the larger instances also!**
